title: Integration Tests for Quarkus Native Image for AWS Lambda do not work with multiple lambdas
body:
### Describe the bug

I was running integration tests with quarkus in order to test that the native image actually works as intended, since I had issues before with forgetting to add some `@RegisterForReflection`. Our project contains multiple Lambda handlers which we test by having a `QuarkusTestProfile` overriding `quarkus.lambda.handler` for the respective lambda we want to test in a specific test.

When having multiple lambdas in the same project, as is generated by the mvn archetype described in the [documentation](https://quarkus.io/guides/amazon-lambda) it seems to be not trivially possible to run integration tests against multiple lambdas at the same time. Thus we resorted to the `QuarkusTestProfile`.

During the execution of the integration tests it seems that the test framework tries to start the native image multiple times. It ignores any port indication I might provide however:

```
Executing "target/test-1.0-SNAPSHOT-runner -Dquarkus.log.file.path=target/quarkus.log -Dquarkus.log.file.enable=true -Dquarkus-internal.aws-lambda.test-api=localhost:8081/_lambda_ -Dquarkus.lambda.mock-event-server.test-port=8082 -Dquarkus.configuration.build-time-mismatch-at-runtime=fail -Dquarkus.lambda.handler=first -Dquarkus.lambda.mock-event-server.dev-port=8082 -Dquarkus.http.port=8082 -Dquarkus.http.test-port=8082"
```

As you can see I tried overriding all ports, including `quarkus-internal.aws-lambda.test-api`. The `quarkus-internal.aws-lambda.test-api` is ignored however and set hard to port 8081.

Regular tests run fine.

### Expected behavior

Integration tests should run without issue, either be not ignoring the ports I set or by stopping the running image (or port listen) before starting the next.

### Actual behavior

Test crash because port is already in use:

```
[ERROR] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 3.595 s <<< FAILURE! - in org.test.SecondLambdaHandlerIT
[ERROR] org.test.SecondLambdaHandlerIT.testSimpleLambdaSuccess  Time elapsed: 0.001 s  <<< ERROR!
java.lang.RuntimeException:
java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
        [error]: Build step io.quarkus.amazon.lambda.deployment.DevServicesLambdaProcessor#startEventServer threw an exception: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.net.BindException: Address already in use
...
```

### How to Reproduce?

[project.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/8521206/project.zip)

Open the project zip and run `mvn clean verify -Dnative -Dquarkus.native.container-build=true`



### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux NB01202 5.10.16.3-microsoft-standard-WSL2 #1 SMP Fri Apr 2 22:23:49 UTC 2021 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

openjdk version "17.0.2" 2022-01-18
